title: After completing 10th class, any government scholarship? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi. List of Scholarship available after 10th class Chief Minister Scholarship Scheme 2017 Jawaharlal Nehru Fellowship SHDF Scholarship Minority StudentsYogi Adityanath Govt Announces Rs.10,000 Reward in UP for 10th Pass Students Maulana Azad National Scholarship Loreal India – For Young Women in Science Scholarships Central Sector Scheme AICTE Scholarship Scheme for Girl Child Indian Oil Academic Scholarship for Class 10, 12 passed students G.P. Birla Educational Scholarship Schemes Sahu Jain Trust- Loan Scholarship BEST (Being Enabler Scholarship Test) BEST is a free online scholarship test for classes 6th to 12th students. BEST is a great opportunity for students to showcase their skills and knowledge. Students can win scholarships worth Rs.1.35 crore! The syllabus for BEST is same as per the school’s curriculum. For more information please visit Scholarship for School Students of Class 10 - Scholar Square Thank you. I hope it helps you. And if not I am here for a social cause for helping my fellow mates. All the best.
